001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
011import java.util.Arrays;
012import java.util.List;
013import org.openqa.selenium.By;
014
015/**
016 * Implementation of the {@link SelectService} interface, providing methods to select options,
017 * retrieve available and selected options, and determine if certain options are visible or enabled.
018 * Extends {@link AbstractComponentService} to handle the creation and retrieval of {@link Select}
019 * instances.
020 *
021 * <p>This class relies on the {@link SelectComponentType} to identify the correct component for
022 * select-type elements, allowing test automation to manage dropdowns, multi-select fields, or
023 * similar widgets in a consistent manner.
024 *
025 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
026 */
027public class SelectServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<SelectComponentType, Select> implements SelectService {
028
029   private static final String SELECT_OPTIONS_CONTAINER =
030         "Selecting options %s in container %s for select component %s";
031   private static final String SELECT_OPTION_CONTAINER = "Selecting option %s in container %s for select component %s";
032   private static final String SELECT_OPTIONS_LOCATOR =
033         "Selecting options %s in container with locator %s for select component %s";
034   private static final String SELECT_OPTION_LOCATOR =
035         "Selecting option %s in container with locator %s for select component %s";
036   private static final String SELECT_OPTIONS_STRATEGY_CONTAINER =
037         "Selecting options with strategy %s in container %s for select component %s";
038   private static final String SELECT_OPTIONS_STRATEGY_LOCATOR =
039         "Selecting options with strategy %s in container with locator %s for select component %s";
040
041   private static final String GET_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS_CONTAINER =
042         "Getting available options in container %s for select component %s";
043   private static final String GET_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS_LOCATOR =
044         "Getting available options in container with locator %s for select component %s";
045   private static final String GET_SELECTED_OPTIONS_CONTAINER =
046         "Getting selected options in container %s for select component %s";
047   private static final String GET_SELECTED_OPTIONS_LOCATOR =
048         "Getting selected options in container with locator %s for select component %s";
049
050   private static final String CHECK_OPTION_VISIBLE_CONTAINER =
051         "Checking if option %s is visible in container %s for select component %s";
052   private static final String CHECK_OPTION_VISIBLE_LOCATOR =
053         "Checking if option %s is visible in container with locator %s for select component %s";
054
055   private static final String CHECK_OPTION_ENABLED_CONTAINER =
056         "Checking if option %s is enabled in container %s for select component %s";
057   private static final String CHECK_OPTION_ENABLED_LOCATOR =
058         "Checking if option %s is enabled in container with locator %s for select component %s";
059
060   private static final String INSERT_SELECT_VALUES_LOCATOR =
061         "Inserting values %s for select component %s using locator %s";
062
063   /**
064    * Constructs a new {@code SelectServiceImpl} with the specified {@link SmartWebDriver}.
065    *
066    * @param driver the smart web driver for interacting with browser elements.
067    */
068   public SelectServiceImpl(SmartWebDriver driver) {
069      super(driver);
070   }
071
072   /**
073    * Creates and returns a {@link Select} component instance based on the provided
074    * {@link SelectComponentType}.
075    *
076    * @param componentType the select component type.
077    * @return a new or existing {@link Select} instance.
078    */
079   @Override
080   protected Select createComponent(final SelectComponentType componentType) {
081      return ComponentFactory.getSelectComponent(componentType, driver);
082   }
083
084   /**
085    * Selects one or more options by text or value within a container.
086    *
087    * @param componentType the select component type.
088    * @param container     the container holding the select element.
089    * @param values        one or more option values to select.
090    */
091   @Override
092   public void selectOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
093                             final String... values) {
094      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_OPTIONS_CONTAINER, Arrays.toString(values), container, componentType));
095      selectComponent(componentType).selectOptions(container, values);
096   }
097
098   /**
099    * Selects one or more options within a container identified by a locator.
100    *
101    * @param componentType    the select component type.
102    * @param containerLocator the locator for the container.
103    * @param values           one or more option values to select.
104    */
105   @Override
106   public void selectOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator,
107                             final String... values) {
108      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_OPTIONS_LOCATOR, Arrays.toString(values), containerLocator, componentType));
109      selectComponent(componentType).selectOptions(containerLocator, values);
110   }
111
112   /**
113    * Selects options using a custom {@link Strategy}, returning the list of newly selected
114    * option texts.
115    *
116    * @param componentType the select component type.
117    * @param container     the container holding the select element.
118    * @param strategy      the strategy to apply.
119    * @return a list of texts representing the selected options.
120    */
121   @Override
122   public List<String> selectOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
123                                     final Strategy strategy) {
124      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_OPTIONS_STRATEGY_CONTAINER, strategy, container, componentType));
125      return selectComponent(componentType).selectOptions(container, strategy);
126   }
127
128   /**
129    * Selects options using a custom {@link Strategy} within a container identified by a locator,
130    * returning the list of newly selected option texts.
131    *
132    * @param componentType    the select component type.
133    * @param containerLocator the locator for the container.
134    * @param strategy         the strategy to apply.
135    * @return a list of texts representing the selected options.
136    */
137   @Override
138   public List<String> selectOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator,
139                                     final Strategy strategy) {
140      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_OPTIONS_STRATEGY_LOCATOR, strategy, containerLocator, componentType));
141      return selectComponent(componentType).selectOptions(containerLocator, strategy);
142   }
143
144   /**
145    * Selects a single option by text or value within a container. Delegates to
146    * {@link #selectOptions(SelectComponentType, SmartWebElement, String...)}.
147    *
148    * @param componentType the select component type.
149    * @param container     the container holding the select element.
150    * @param value         the value of the option to select.
151    */
152   @Override
153   public void selectOption(final SelectComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
154                            final String value) {
155      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_OPTION_CONTAINER, value, container, componentType));
156      selectOptions(componentType, container, value);
157   }
158
159   /**
160    * Selects a single option by text or value within a container identified by a locator.
161    * Delegates to {@link #selectOptions(SelectComponentType, By, String...)}.
162    *
163    * @param componentType    the select component type.
164    * @param containerLocator the locator for the container.
165    * @param value            the value of the option to select.
166    */
167   @Override
168   public void selectOption(final SelectComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator,
169                            final String value) {
170      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_OPTION_LOCATOR, value, containerLocator, componentType));
171      selectOptions(componentType, containerLocator, value);
172   }
173
174   /**
175    * Retrieves all available options in a select component within the specified container.
176    *
177    * @param componentType the select component type.
178    * @param container     the container holding the select element.
179    * @return a list of all available option texts.
180    */
181   @Override
182   public List<String> getAvailableOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
183      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS_CONTAINER, container, componentType));
184      return selectComponent(componentType).getAvailableOptions(container);
185   }
186
187   /**
188    * Retrieves all available options in a select component, identified by a container locator.
189    *
190    * @param componentType    the select component type.
191    * @param containerLocator the locator for the container.
192    * @return a list of all available option texts.
193    */
194   @Override
195   public List<String> getAvailableOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator) {
196      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS_LOCATOR, containerLocator, componentType));
197      return selectComponent(componentType).getAvailableOptions(containerLocator);
198   }
199
200   /**
201    * Retrieves all currently selected options within a container holding a select component.
202    *
203    * @param componentType the select component type.
204    * @param container     the container holding the select element.
205    * @return a list of texts representing the selected options.
206    */
207   @Override
208   public List<String> getSelectedOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
209      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_SELECTED_OPTIONS_CONTAINER, container, componentType));
210      return selectComponent(componentType).getSelectedOptions(container);
211   }
212
213   /**
214    * Retrieves all currently selected options from a select component, identified by a container locator.
215    *
216    * @param componentType    the select component type.
217    * @param containerLocator the locator for the container.
218    * @return a list of texts representing the selected options.
219    */
220   @Override
221   public List<String> getSelectedOptions(final SelectComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator) {
222      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_SELECTED_OPTIONS_LOCATOR, containerLocator, componentType));
223      return selectComponent(componentType).getSelectedOptions(containerLocator);
224   }
225
226   /**
227    * Checks if a specific option is visible in the select component within the given container.
228    *
229    * @param componentType the select component type.
230    * @param container     the container holding the select element.
231    * @param value         the text or value of the option.
232    * @return true if the option is visible, otherwise false.
233    */
234   @Override
235   public boolean isOptionVisible(final SelectComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
236                                  final String value) {
237      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_OPTION_VISIBLE_CONTAINER, value, container, componentType));
238      return selectComponent(componentType).isOptionVisible(container, value);
239   }
240
241   /**
242    * Checks if a specific option is visible in the select component identified by a container locator.
243    *
244    * @param componentType    the select component type.
245    * @param containerLocator the locator for the container.
246    * @param value            the text or value of the option.
247    * @return true if the option is visible, otherwise false.
248    */
249   @Override
250   public boolean isOptionVisible(final SelectComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator,
251                                  final String value) {
252      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_OPTION_VISIBLE_LOCATOR, value, containerLocator, componentType));
253      return selectComponent(componentType).isOptionVisible(containerLocator, value);
254   }
255
256   /**
257    * Checks if a specific option is enabled in the select component within the given container.
258    *
259    * @param componentType the select component type.
260    * @param container     the container holding the select element.
261    * @param value         the text or value of the option.
262    * @return true if the option is enabled, otherwise false.
263    */
264   @Override
265   public boolean isOptionEnabled(final SelectComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
266                                  final String value) {
267      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_OPTION_ENABLED_CONTAINER, value, container, componentType));
268      return selectComponent(componentType).isOptionEnabled(container, value);
269   }
270
271   /**
272    * Checks if a specific option is enabled in the select component identified by a container locator.
273    *
274    * @param componentType    the select component type.
275    * @param containerLocator the locator for the container.
276    * @param value            the text or value of the option.
277    * @return true if the option is enabled, otherwise false.
278    */
279   @Override
280   public boolean isOptionEnabled(final SelectComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator,
281                                  final String value) {
282      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_OPTION_ENABLED_LOCATOR, value, containerLocator, componentType));
283      return selectComponent(componentType).isOptionEnabled(containerLocator, value);
284   }
285
286   /**
287    * Inserts data by selecting one or more options based on the provided array of values.
288    * This supports the {@link Insertion} contract.
289    *
290    * @param componentType the component type (expected to be a {@link SelectComponentType}).
291    * @param locator       the locator identifying the container.
292    * @param values        the values to be selected.
293    */
294   @Override
295   public void insertion(final ComponentType componentType, final By locator, final Object... values) {
296      if (!(componentType instanceof SelectComponentType selectType)) {
297         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Component type needs to be from: SelectComponentType.");
298      }
299      LogUi.step(String.format(INSERT_SELECT_VALUES_LOCATOR, Arrays.toString(values), componentType, locator));
300      String[] stringValues = Arrays.stream(values)
301            .map(String::valueOf)
302            .toArray(String[]::new);
303      selectOptions(selectType, locator, stringValues);
304   }
305
306   /**
307    * Retrieves the underlying {@link Select} instance for the specified component type.
308    *
309    * @param componentType the select component type.
310    * @return the {@link Select} instance handling operations on this component type.
311    */
312   private Select selectComponent(final SelectComponentType componentType) {
313      return getOrCreateComponent(componentType);
314   }
315}
